title: I'm 31 and I live alone. I have been incredibly lonely during the pandemic and would love to have someone to talk to. Is anyone interested in being pen pals? - Quora

response.answer_text: Good friends, whether “virtual” or in real life, are the ultimate treasure. However, friendship is usually based on common interests, values and experiences. Why don’t you say something about yourself and the topics you like discussing, so that people can respond in ways that are relevant to you? I would gladly communicate if I had anything to say that would interest you.
Hi there, it's a trying time isn't it. I've lived alone and know how lonely it can feel at times. I'm in the UK, how about you? I would love to be a pen pal. X
